devDet: React js and Node Js developer, with knowledge in Graphic Design.
euDet: Hello, my name is Aleksei Sousa, 24 years old, I am a Front End programmer and designer. I am enchanted by the technology area, and I found myself in the programming area.Qualities:
calD: A calculator with all the features of an Android phone
lanD: My first project, still in HTML and CSS
netD: A clone website, with all the design and responsiveness of the original
priD: At first, I wanted to understand the Grid display
mapD: The application allows logged in users to schedule and control work on the streets
meuD: I redid my website, decided to redo it in React.js
Front: Front-end comprises the visual part of websites and applications. In other words, the area of ​​the pages where people can interact.
Back: The back-end works at the “back” of the application. He is responsible, in general terms, for implementing the business rule.
Git: Git is responsible for saving the change history whenever someone modifies a file that is being monitored by it.
Insomnia: Insomnia is an Open Source framework for developing/testing API Clients.
Postman: Postman is an API Client that makes it easy for developers to create, share, test, and document APIs.
React: React.Js makes creating interactive UIs an easy task. It will efficiently update and render only the necessary components as the data changes.
Node: Node.js is a server-side JavaScript code execution environment
Javascript: JavaScript has a strong focus on the Front-end (client side), that is, it is commonly used to run on the “client side” of the application.
Mysql: MySQL is a database management system that uses the SQL language as an interface. MySQL is a popular choice for websites, blogs, online stores, and content management systems (CMS)
Mongo: Mongo DB is an open source, non-relational database management system (DBMS) that uses flexible documents instead of tables and rows to process and store various forms of data.
Api: APIs are sometimes described as a contract between an information provider and a user, setting out the content required by the consumer (the call) and the content required by the producer (the response).
Html: Hypertext Markup Language (HTML) is a computer language that makes up most web pages and online applications.
Css: CSS is called Cascading Style Sheet language and is used to style elements written in a markup language like HTML.
Figma: Figma is a design tool created with the aim of making the practice of design more accessible.
Photoshop: Photoshop is used for image editing, creating digital art, graphic design, and animations.
CorelDraw: CorelDRAW is software developed to enable the creation of a wide range of visual communication products, such as drawings, folders, photo retouching, among others.
